Product Description

Curated with Care

Clean and composed lines, modern design, and a strong focus on quality are the foundations Juvale is built on.

Wooden Block Calendar

These cute farmhouse calendar blocks feature dates that can be updated each morning. The interchangeable wooden calendar can be used at home or in businesses. Plus, the rustic date blocks make an excellent gift for teacher appreciation or to help students stay organized.

Dimension: 5W x 4H in

Rustic Calendar Blocks

Our wooden perpetual calendar includes 2 numbered wooden cubes and 3 monthly blocks in a vintage-looking storage container.

Farmhouse Desk Accessories

This office desk calendar can also be displayed on your mantel, living room table, home, bookshelves, dorm room, classroom, or kitchen counter.

Month + Day

Keep track of the date when at home, school, medical practice, restaurant, or boutique counter.

Modern Solutions

Uncomplicate your home with our affordable, stylish, and long-lasting, home décor, kitchen and entertaining accessories.

Thoughtful Design

Each homeware collection combines contemporary aesthetics with the quality and minimalism of European and Scandinavian design.

Size
5W x 4H in 4.5L x 2.5W x 5.8H in 6W x 16H in

Material
Wood Wood Tin

Wooden Perpetual Calendar: This perpetual calendar includes numbered wooden cubes and monthly blocks in a vintage-looking storage container to help you keep track of the date
Great for Any Occasion: The cute decorative calendar blocks are perfect for teacher desk decor, school and classroom shelves, office supplies, medical practices, coffee shops, and restaurants
Easy to Use: The individual day and month date blocks for desk can be easily changed to reflect the current date or holiday
Dimensions: The block calendar for desk set measures 5.3 x 3.7 x 2.6 inches; each numbered cube measures 2.3 x 2.3 inches; each of the 3 month-printed blocks measure 4.7 x 0.8 inches
Comes With: You will receive 2 numbered wooden cubes and 3 monthly blocks in a vintage-style storage container to add to your farmhouse office decor
